name: @Youtube 2013: Cinema + Assorted Tweaks
description:
Youtube Cinema:
* Full width video with large, dark margins to eliminate need for youtube darkening addons/css. 

Assorted Youtube Tweaks:
* Highlight author comments (ie, your own comments).
* Larger default textarea input for comment posting; comment style tweaking.
* Larger add-to-playlist panels; tint favorites playlist.
* Improved visibility of watched video (video feed) 
* Style some visited video links
* Hide QA feedback link
* Minor visibility tweaks
